short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-scale the loudness (not volume), and auto-apply custom playback speed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loudness Scaler is an extension that ensures a consistent listening experience on YouTube, by automatically adjusting audio and video volume to a user-set level. It enforces a global playback speed and auto-scales the volume based on a preset loudness you are comfortable with.
